00067 /*! PLIER model file header structure */
00068 typedef struct _MDLHeader
00069 {
00070         int32_t nVersion;                                       /*! Model file version number */
00071         int32_t nNumProbes;                                     /*! Number pf probes */
00072         int32_t nAnalysisType;                          /*! PLIER analysis type */
00073         char    sChipType[64];                  /*! Probe array type */
00074         char    sModifiedDate[36];              /*!Last modified date */
00075         int32_t bMasked;                                        /*! Model file generated with masking */
00076         char    sReserve[RESERVED_SIZE]; /*! Reserved for future use */
00077 } MDLHeader;
00078 
00079 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00080 /*! End of one byte alignment */
00081 #pragma pack(pop)
00082 #endif
00083 
00084 /*! This is the size of the object */
00085 #define MDLHEADERSIZE sizeof(MDLHeader)
00086 
00087 /*! PLIER model file header class */
00088 class CMDLFileHeader
00089 {
00090 protected:
00091         int32_t         m_nVersion;                             /*! Model file version number */
00092         int32_t         m_nNumProbes;                   /*! Number pf probes */
00093         int32_t         m_nAnalysisType;                /*! PLIER analysis type */
00094         bool            m_bMasked;                      /*! Model file generated with masking */
00095         std::string     m_strChipType;          /*! Probe array type */
00096         std::string     m_strModifiedDate;      /*! Last modified date */
00097         std::string     m_strReserve;           /*! Reserved for future use */
00098 
00099         friend class CMDLFileData; /*! Friend to the parent class */
00100 
00101 public:
00102

00178 /*! PLIER model data structure */
00179 typedef struct _MDLData
00180 {
00181         double  Affinity;                               /*! Affinity value */
00182         float   RelativeBkg;                    /*! Reserved for future use */
00183         float   Saturation;                             /*! Reserved for future use */
00184         float   Offset;                                 /*! Reserved for future use */
00185 } MDLData;
00186 
00187 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00188 /*! End of one byte alignment */
00189 #pragma pack(pop)
00190 #endif
00191 
00192 /*! This is the size of the object */
00193 #define MDLDATASIZE sizeof(MDLData)
00194

00197 {

00206         char    *m_lpData;                              /*! Memory map pointer */

00263 /*! PLIER model file stores the model data as the structure defined above.
00264  (1)    It is probe array type specific. Only the model file
00265                   with the same probe array type can be used for PLIER analysis
00266  (2)    It stores the model data for each probe (or cells).
00267  (3)    It starts storing model data for all PM probes and follows by
00268                         all MM probes.
00269  (4)    Sum(a(j)) = # of probes
00270 */
00271 class CMDLFileData
00272 {
00273 protected:
00274         /*! The file header */
00275         CMDLFileHeader  m_Header;
00276 
00277         /*! The file name */
00278         std::string             m_strFileName;
00279 
00280         /*! Stores an error message */
00281         std::string             m_strError;
00282 
00283         /*! The probe data */
00284         std::vector<CMDLProbeData> m_ProbeData;
00285 
00286         /*! Gets the header
00287          * @param pHeader The header data
00288          */
00289         void GetHeaderInfo(MDLHeader* pHeader);
00290 
00291         /*! Sets the header
00292          * @param pHeader The header data
00293          */
00294         void SetHeaderInfo(MDLHeader* pHeader);
00295 
00296         /*! Sets the data in the class
00297          * @param pData The data
00298          * @param data The probe data
00299          */
00300         void SetDataInfo(MDLData* pData, CMDLProbeData *data);
00301 
00302         /*! Gets the data from the class
00303          * @param pData The data
00304          * @param data The probe data
00305          */
00306         void GetDataInfo(MDLData* pData, CMDLProbeData &data);
00307 
00308         /*! Opens the file
00309          * @param bReadHeaderOnly Flag to read only the header
00310          * @return True if successful
00311          */
00312         bool Open(bool bReadHeaderOnly=false);
00313 
00314         /*! Reads the file
00315          * @param bReadHeaderOnly Flag to read only the header
00316          * @return True if successful
00317          */
00318         bool ReadFile(bool bReadHeaderOnly=false);
00319 
00320         /*! Reads the file header
00321          * @param instr The file stream.
00322          * @return True if successful
00323          */
00324         bool ReadFileHeader(std::ifstream &instr);
00325 
00326 #if defined(_USE_MEM_MAPPING_) && defined(_MSC_VER)
00327         bool ReadFileUsingMemMap(bool bReadHeaderOnly);
00328         void  *m_lpFileMap;
00329         char  *m_lpData;
00330         HANDLE m_hFileMap;
00331         HANDLE m_hFile;
00332         bool m_bFileOpen;
00333         bool m_bFileMapped;
00334         int32_t m_nHeaderOffset;
00335 #endif
00336 
00337 public:
00338 
00339         /*! Sets the file name
00340          * @param value The file name
00341          */
00342         void SetFileName(const char *value)                     { m_strFileName = value; }
00343 
00344         /*! Returns the file name
00345          * @return The file name
00346          */
00347         std::string GetFileName() const                         { return m_strFileName; }
00348 
00349         /*! The error message
00350          * @return The error message
00351          */
00352         std::string GetError() const                            { return m_strError; }
00353 
00354         /*! Returns the header
00355          * @return The file header object
00356          */
00357         CMDLFileHeader &GetHeader() { return m_Header; }
00358 
00359         /*! Sets the header
00360          * @param header The header to save
00361          */
00362         void SetHeader(CMDLFileHeader& header) { m_Header = header; }
00363 
00364         /*! Gets the probe data
00365          * @param index Index to the probe data object
00366          * @param data The probe data
00367          */
00368         void GetProbeData(int32_t index, CMDLProbeData& data);
00369 
00370         /*! Sets the probe data
00371          * @param index Index to the probe data object
00372          * @param data The probe data
00373          */
00374         void SetProbeData(int32_t index, CMDLProbeData data);
00375 
00376         /*! Reads the entire file
00377          * @return True if successful
00378          */
00379         bool Read();
00380 
00381         /*! Reads the file header only
00382          * @return True if successful
00383          */
00384         bool ReadHeader();
00385 
00386         /*! Writes the file
00387          * @return True if successful
00388          */
00389         bool Write();
00390 
00391         /*! Checks if the file exists
00392          * @return True if the file exists
00393          */
00394         bool Exists();
00395 
00396         /*! Closes the file */
00397         void Close();
00398 
00399         /*! Initializes the object for writing
00400          * @param nSize The size
00401          * @param defAffinity The default affynity value
00402          * @param analysisType The analysis type
00403          */
00404         void InitializeForWriting(int32_t nSize=0, double defAffinity=1.0, int32_t analysisType=MDL_PLIER);
00405 
00406         /*! Outputs the file context for debugging
00407          * @param sFile The output file name
00408          * @param nProbes The number of probes
00409          * @return True if successful
00410          */
00411         bool PrintMDLToTextFile(const char* sFile, int32_t nProbes);
00412 
00413         /*! Constructor */
00414         CMDLFileData(int32_t nSize=0, double defAffinity=1.0, int32_t analysisType=MDL_PLIER);
00415 
00416         /*! Destructor */
00417         ~CMDLFileData();
00418 };
